CustomField.description: Class name of class which need to extend the SObjectChangeModule.FunctionalStep. If Anync flag is checked the action class need to extends SObjectChangeModule.AsyncFunctionalStep.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Class name of class which need to extend the SObjectChangeModule.FunctionalStep. If Anync flag is checked the action class need to extends SObjectChangeModule.AsyncFunctionalStep
CustomField.label: Class Name
